short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily check your YouTube playback speed with this extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features:

Custom Speed Control: Seamlessly adjust video playback speeds on YouTube, ranging from slower to faster rates, catering to various learning paces.
Efficient Consumption: Speed up entertainment videos or podcasts for quicker enjoyment without compromising clarity.
